short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Connect instantly with your clients and co-workers anywhere.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
YakChatÂ® SMS-enables your browser applications to connect instantly with your customers and co-workers.  Simply click the YakChat icon beside any recognized phone numbers to send a new text message or open YakChat in a side panel to see your new messages or view your text conversations.  

Note: A YakChat license is required to use this extension and texts can only be sent to phone numbers in the United States, Canada, United Kingdom and Australia.  Visit https://yakchat.com to purchase the YakChat service.
